entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
